text: Guanyu fuhuo shi de renshi, zhi guiyu ta; guoshi de tuo e, nuxing de huaiyun he fenmian, wu yi buzai ta de dong jian zhong. Zai na ri, ta jiang wen tamen:`Nimen wangcheng wei wo de huoban de, zai nali ne?'Tamen jiang shuo:`Women baogao ni, women zhong jue meiyou yigeren neng zuo zheng zhe jian shi.'
